landingScreen.openingMessage: Welcome to {bankName}! What would you like to do?
deposit.input.text: Please enter the amount to deposit:
quit.message:
Thank you for banking with {bankName}.
Have a nice day!
deposit.message.after:
Thank you. ${amount} has been deposited to your account.
Is there anything else you'd like to do?
withdrawal.input.text: Please enter the amount to withdraw:
withdrawal.message.after:
Thank you. ${amount} has been withdrawn.
Is there anything else you'd like to do?
